name: Spaceshift in Spaceship
description:
Take a seat in this fast spaceship. Navigate into the asteroïd belt and complete tasks to make your ship more efficient. Let’s hope the overview effect won’t affect you too much otherwise you’ll crash :)

Controls

UpArrow & DownArrow to control the spaceship.

Mouse to clear the tasks.

IMPORTANT

For people for whom the download link does not work, you can use this link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RlPeTh6VmmbH2q0B4nunnJk8xPxSikum/view?usp=sharing
